key_risks: High debt levels and financial instability post-bankruptcy
Operational challenges in EV fleet expansion
Dependence on travel demand fluctuations and economic conditions
Reliance on franchisees and ride-hailing partnerships
controversies: Class action lawsuit for alleged securities violations
False vehicle theft reporting and related legal claims
Customer service issues and reputational damage
environmental_issues: Challenges in transitioning to a sustainable EV fleet
social_issues: Customer trust issues due to past controversies
Potential impact of operational changes on employees and franchisees
governance_issues: Underweight ratings from analysts due to financial and market concerns
